member.summary: Character to use when replacing redacted text.
member.value: The value to use when replacing each character in the redacted text. The default value is `*`.

member.value: The 0-based index of the first character that forms this word in the Characters list. Default value is **0**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.DocumentWord.LastCharacterIndex
member.summary: The index of the last character that forms this word in the Characters list.
member.value: The 0-based index of the last character that forms this word in the Characters list. Default value is **0**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.DocumentWord.Value
member.summary: The string value of the word.
member.value: The string value of the word. Default value is **null**.
